Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Washington/Wabash
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Washington/Wabash due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Washington/Wabash due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: #62 Archer buses.

Also, as a result of the delay, Orange, Brown, Pink and Purple Line trains are operating on the Outer Loop (Wells side).

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
